content.text: Match ends, Almería 0, Barcelona 2.
Second Half ends, Almería 0, Barcelona 2.
Attempt saved. Dani Alves (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a headed pass.
Foul by Sebastián Dubarbier (Almería).
Dani Alves (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Barcelona. Jonathan dos Santos replaces Andrés Iniesta.
